hotels.title: Modern Sharjah City Break Moments from Al Qasba with Restaurant, Rooftop Swimming Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the cultural capital of the UAE at this contemporary Pullman stay, where luxury meets inspiration in the vibrant Al Taawun district. Just minutes from Al Khan Lagoon, Sharjah Expo Centre and the buzzing Al Qasba waterfront, this five-star hotel blends upscale comfort with dynamic energy. Venture out to discover traditional souks, high-end shopping malls and fascinating museums, returning to the hotel for a refreshing dip in the rooftop swimming pool or a fresh juice at the poolside bar. Recharge with a sweet treat and freshly-brewed coffee at The Junction or feast on international favourites and Middle Eastern fare at Al Khan Restaurant, before retiring to your modern room or suite boasting views over the dazzling city or sparkling lagoon.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Sharjah Stay near Expo Centre with Two Restaurants & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Embrace the urban elegance of Sharjah from this Novotel abode, perfectly positioned near the Sharjah Expo Centre and overlooking the serene Al Mamzar Lagoon. Soak up panoramic views from your contemporary room or suite, take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool and work up a sweat at the onsite fitness centre. When it's time to indulge, savour Middle Eastern and Moroccan delicacies at the stylish Tahi, or lounge poolside with refreshing drinks and light bites from the Pool Cafe. Head out to discover nearby cultural and shopping hubs, including the Blue Souk, Al Noor Mosque and the Sharjah Art Museum, or head to Dubai for the day.
